H0.text: Which arid region of Ethiopia was invaded by Somalia in 1977. Afar Triangle

H1.text: Which arid region of Ethiopia was invaded by Somalia in 1977. Danakil Desert

H2.text: Which arid region of Ethiopia was invaded by Somalia in 1977. Somali Highlands

H3.text: Which arid region of Ethiopia was invaded by Somalia in 1977. Ogadēn

A4.text: Ethiopia and Somalia fought the Ogaden War during 1977–78 over the region and its peoples.

A5.text: The Ogaden region is one of the historical names used for the modern Somali Region.
